The poor Intellectual Animal mistakenly called Man, normally lives on the two lower floors, but never in life does he use the two superior floors. The Intellectual Animal divides his painful an d miserable life between run-of-the- mill sleep and the improperly called Vi gil state, which unfortunately is another form of sleep.
